post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Brad - we have a project gearing up - we are looking for solid developers who have atleast iPlanet 3.0 - JSR-168 portlet development experience. This project could last for 2 years so a solid long-term contract. We are also looking for a System Architect surrounding iplanet/SunONE portal server - do you know any Syst.architects that specialize with SunONE/iPlanet 3.0+? Thanks for your help Brad, Jason
Jason H. Price CLIENT MANAGER
Brainhunter.com 2 Sheppard Avenue East Suite 700 (Sheppard Centre) North York, Ontario, M2N 5Y7 P. 416.225.9900 x240 F. 416.225.9104
post.title: SunONE Portal Project - JSR-168 portlets required
